sections.body: Guardians of balance, sovereign dragons, or lungwangs as they are also known, were placed in the skies by the gods themselves to safeguard harmony in the world.

reach: 15 ft. (20 ft. with bite and gore)
special_qualities: change shape, dogmatic discordance, golden armor
